description:
This market refers to the LoL match between HANJIN BRION and Hanwha Life Esports in the LCK Cup Group Stage, scheduled for January 22 at 3:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Hanwha Life Esports" if Hanwha Life Esports secures 4 or more drakes than HANJIN BRION in the match. 

Otherwise, it will resolve to "HANJIN BRION".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the LoL match between OKSavingsBank BRION and Hanwha Life Esports in the LCK Cup Group Stage, scheduled for January 22 at 3:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "OKSavingsBank BRION" if OKSavingsBank BRION win the match against Hanwha Life Esports.

This market will resolve to "Hanwha Life Esports" if Hanwha Life Esports win the match against OKSavingsBank BRION.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.
events.title: LoL: OKSavingsBank BRION vs Hanwha Life Esports (BO3) - LCK Cup Group Stage
